Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the announcement of a sixth season of Breaking Bad by stating that the creator announced it in an exclusive CNN interview, when in fact it was a fake news article.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no official announcement or confirmation of a sixth season of Breaking Bad.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on fake news articles from unreliable sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the creator of Breaking Bad has announced a sixth season without any evidence or official confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is based on fake news articles and there is no actual announcement of a sixth season.
